history.details: CHAT-001: Initialize Next.js project with TypeScript and app router (PR #40)
CHAT-003: Set up FastAPI backend with project structure (PR #41)
CHAT-002: Configure TailwindCSS with design system tokens (PR #42)
CHAT-008: Create shared TypeScript type definitions and API client (PR #43)
CHAT-005: Configure environment variables and CORS settings (PR #44)
CHAT-006: Implement WebSocket infrastructure for real-time communication (PR #45)
CHAT-007: Set up development tooling: ESLint, Prettier, and concurrent dev servers (PR #46)
CHAT-004: Create application layout shell with sidebar and main content area (PR #47)
Phase 1: Foundation -- COMPLETE. All 8/8 tickets done. Milestone M-1 achieved: Frontend and Backend Scaffold.
CHAT-040: Set up Auth.js with custom ServiceNow OAuth 2.0 provider (PR #52)
CHAT-041: Create login page and sign-out flow (PR #53)
CHAT-042: Add backend authentication middleware for ServiceNow token validation (PR #54)
CHAT-043: Add protected routes and user profile display in sidebar (PR #55)
Phase 1b: Authentication -- COMPLETE. All 4/4 tickets done. Milestone M-1b achieved: ServiceNow OAuth SSO.
CHAT-010: Build message display with chat bubbles and agent avatars (PR #56)
CHAT-011: Implement streaming response display with typing indicator (PR #57)

CHAT-014: Wire up full chat flow: input to display with WebSocket updates (PR #58). Integration ticket that also merged CHAT-009 (MessageInput), CHAT-012 (AgentSelector), CHAT-013 (chat endpoint). Created ChatProvider context, ChatHeader, ChatErrorBoundary, full ChatPage.

Phase 2: Chat Core -- COMPLETE. All 6/6 tickets done. Milestone M-2 achieved: Functional Chat Interface. Users can send messages, see streaming responses, and select which ITOM agent to interact with.

Auto mode session ended. Reason: scope_exhausted (Phase 2 complete). Duration: ~2h. Completed: 3 tickets (CHAT-010 PR#56, CHAT-011 PR#57, CHAT-014 PR#58). Skipped: 0. Report: Phase 2 Chat Core 100% complete.
Auto-mode pipeline run started for CHAT-044: Add development auth bypass with configurable AUTH_MODE. Phase: phase-1b. Target: 1 ticket.

CHAT-044: Add development auth bypass with configurable AUTH_MODE (PR #60). Squash-merged to main. 12 files changed across frontend and backend. AUTH_MODE env var (sso|dev) controls authentication strategy.
Auto mode session ended. Reason: target_reached (1/1 tickets completed). Completed: CHAT-044 (PR #60). All 5 pipeline steps passed. Auto-merged to main.
